name: Three days of Fright
description:
In celebration of Halloween, i made 3 horror games in 3 days.

"Rise" : After your ship sank during a heavy storm, you get stranded on a mystirious island.

"The Cave": You find yourself in a pitch-black cave. You must find all of your equipment to escape, but you are not alone...

"Shadows": In a ruined city, you must activate power generators. In the dark of the night shadowy figuires are lurking. Use your flashlight to defend yourself.

Controls:

-Move: W,A,S,D

-Jump: Space

-Return to menu: Esc
